articles.headline: Making Waves in Dairyland
articles.snippet: Ron Kind, a Democratic representative from Wisconsin dairyland, is making a name for himself as a crusader for big changes in farm policy.
articles.abstract: Ron Kind, a Democratic representative from Wisconsin dairyland, is making a name for himself as a crusader for big changes in farm policy.
articles.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, June 19 — Ron Kind, a Democratic representative from Wisconsin dairyland, is making a name for himself as a crusader for big changes in farm policy. It’s making many of his colleagues nervous.

articles.headline: ABC Says It Was Outbid for Paris Hilton Interview
articles.snippet: ABC News said it lost its bid because the network was  unwilling to make a “high six-figure deal” with the Hilton family.
articles.abstract: ABC News said it lost its bid because the network was  unwilling to make a “high six-figure deal” with the Hilton family.
articles.lead_paragraph: How much is an interview with Paris Hilton worth? Representatives of ABC News said yesterday that they had lost to NBC for the first interview with Paris Hilton after her release from jail next week because ABC was unwilling to make a “high six-figure deal” with Ms. Hilton’s family.

articles.headline: In Aiding Poor, Edwards Built Bridge to 2008
articles.snippet: John Edwards’s use of a tax-exempt organization to finance travel and employ political staff was unusual among national candidates.
articles.abstract: John Edwards’s use of a tax-exempt organization to finance travel and employ political staff was unusual among national candidates.
articles.lead_paragraph: John Edwards ended 2004 with a problem: how to keep alive his public profile without the benefit of a presidential campaign that could finance his travels and pay for his political staff.

articles.headline: Blackstone Rival Plans Own I.P.O.
articles.snippet: The company’s initial public offering was priced at $31 a unit, but its archrival Kohlberg Kravis Roberts is said to also be planning an initial offering of its own.
articles.abstract: The company’s initial public offering was priced at $31 a unit, but its archrival Kohlberg Kravis Roberts is said to also be planning an initial offering of its own.
articles.lead_paragraph: Now that the Blackstone Group is off and running, it needs to start looking over its shoulder.
articles.byline: By Michael J. de la Merced and Andrew Ross Sorkin

articles.headline: 2 Companies Drop Pursuit of Dow Jones
articles.snippet: G.E. and Pearson have decided not to make an offer for Dow Jones, leaving Rupert Murdoch’s News Corporation as the only bidder.
articles.abstract: G.E. and Pearson have decided not to make an offer for Dow Jones, leaving Rupert Murdoch’s News Corporation as the only bidder.
articles.lead_paragraph: The General Electric Company and Pearson, the British publisher, have decided not to make an offer for Dow Jones & Company, owner of The Wall Street Journal, G.E. said yesterday, leaving Rupert Murdoch’s News Corporation as the only bidder.

articles.headline: Muslims’ Veils Test Limits of Britain’s Tolerance
articles.snippet: The increasing numbers of veiled Muslim women are fueling the debate over the role of Muslims in British life.
articles.abstract: The increasing numbers of veiled Muslim women are fueling the debate over the role of Muslims in British life.
articles.lead_paragraph: LONDON, June 16 — Increasingly, Muslim women in Britain take their children to school and run errands covered head to toe in flowing black gowns that allow only a slit for their eyes. On a Sunday afternoon in Hyde Park, groups of black-clad Muslim women relaxed on the green baize lawn among the in-line skaters and badminton players.

articles.headline: A Sad Tale of Fictional S.E.C. Filings
articles.snippet: The case of Universal Express shows how hard it can be for the commission to halt what it views as a fraud.
articles.abstract: The case of Universal Express shows how hard it can be for the commission to halt what it views as a fraud.
articles.lead_paragraph: When it comes to disclosures, Universal Express is not exactly a model company.
